diffractem.pre_process module¶

diffractem.pre_process.broadcast(fn, opt: diffractem.pre_proc_opts.PreProcOpts)[source]¶

Pre-processes in one go a dataset comprising movie frames, by transferring the found beam center positions and diffraction spots (in CXI format) from an aggregated set processed earlier.

Parameters

  • {function} -- [description] (fn) –

  • {PreProcOpts} -- [description] (opt) –

Raises

err – [description]

Returns

[type] – [description]

diffractem.pre_process.cumulate(fn, opt: diffractem.pre_proc_opts.PreProcOpts)[source]¶

Applies cumulative summation to a data set comprising movie frame stacks. At the moment, requires the summed frame stacks to have the same shape as the raw data.

Parameters

  • {function} -- [description] (fn) –

  • {PreProcOpts} -- [description] (opt) –

Raises

err – [description]

Returns

[type] – [description]

diffractem.pre_process.find_peaks(ds: Union[diffractem.dataset.Dataset, list, str], opt: Optional[diffractem.pre_proc_opts.PreProcOpts] = None, from_cxi=False, return_cxi=True, revalidate_cxi=False, merge_peaks=True, params: Optional[dict] = None, geo_params: Optional[dict] = None, procs: Optional[int] = None, exc='indexamajig', stream_out: Optional[str] = None, parse=True, **kwargs) → Union[dict, diffractem.stream_parser.StreamParser][source]¶

Handy function to find peaks using peakfinder8 or extract a stream/pandas list from CXI-format stored peaks

Parameters

{Union[Dataset, list, str]} -- dataset, list file, single nexus file, or list of files. (ds) – If a Dataset is supplied, the peakdata will be merged into it.

Keyword Arguments

  • {Optional[pre_proc_opts]} -- pre-processing option object containing defaults for (opt) – indexamajig (default: {None})

  • {bool} -- return a dict of CXI peak arrays instead of pandas dataframe (default (return_cxi) – {True})

  • {Optional[dict]} -- additional parameter for indexamajig (default (params) – {None})

  • {Optional[dict]} -- additional parameters for geometry file, e.g. clen (default (geo_params) – {None})

  • {Optional[int]} -- number of processes. If None, uses all available cores (default (procs) – {None})

  • {str} -- Path of indexamajig executable (default (exc) – {‘indexamajig’})

  • {str} -- File name of stream file, if it should be retained. (stream_out) –

Returns

Union[dict, pd.DataFrame] – Dataframe with peaks if return_cxi==False, otherwise dict of CXI type peak arrays

diffractem.pre_process.refine_center(fn, opt: diffractem.pre_proc_opts.PreProcOpts)[source]¶

Refines the centering of diffraction patterns based on Friedel mate positions.

[list] – [output files]

diffractem.pre_process.subtract_bg(fn, opt: diffractem.pre_proc_opts.PreProcOpts)[source]¶

Subtracts the background of a diffraction pattern by azimuthal integration excluding the Bragg peaks.
